front.title: IEEE Guide for Automatic Reclosing of Circuit Breakers for AC Distribution and Transmission Lines

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Current reclosing practices for transmission and distribution lines are described. Application considerations and coordination practices of reclosing are also discussed. (An errata is available at http://standards.ieee.org/findstds/errata/C37.104-2012_errata.pdf)
